events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit me at all and I would like to return it.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing problems with the purchased jacket.
The case has been assigned to agent Emma Wilson for handling the refund process and further communication.
Hello! I’m Emma, and I’ll assist you with your refund request. Let's get this sorted out for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 4578293, and yes, the jacket is unworn and I still have the tags on it in the original packaging.

Thank you for confirming. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label we will email you, and once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for your help! That sounds perfect. I will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
The return label has been sent to your email, and the refund case is now resolved pending receipt of the item.
We wanted to check in to confirm that you have shipped the jacket back and to ask if you received your refund without any issues.
Yes, I sent the jacket last week and received the refund yesterday. Everything went smoothly, thank you!
Thank you for confirming that your refund was received. We will now close this case but feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
